attributes.action: make sure that people are only monitored and investigated when there is evidence against that person.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the moment the Government is introducing lots of legislation to create databases to monitor the whole of the public on the grounds that they could mine that information to find criminals.  Due to the nature of the data, the chances are that it would not find that many new cases and would lead to a lot of false positives (where innocent people are put under suspicion  through no fault of their own).

We live in a free country.  Or we should do.

Law abiding citizens should be allowed to go about their business without being snooped on.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
